definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: That good for nothing never sends any money to his poor mother.
sentences.chinese: 那个没用的家伙，从不给他可怜的母亲送钱。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在于从不确定传感器数据流中获得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: He always borrows money from others but the repayment is on the Greek calends .
sentences.chinese: 当心那家伙，他总是找别人借钱，但是从不还钱。

sentences.english: Time is the most fair and reasonable-it never gives more to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 时间是最公平合理的，它从不多给谁一分钟。

sentences.english: In order to pine timber, never to the four seasons such as spring greenhouse gallantry.
sentences.chinese: 为了成材，松树从不向四季如春的温室外献殷勤。

sentences.english: Like Dong, Wintour thinks she is never wrong.
sentences.chinese: 与董明珠一样，温图尔认为自己从不出错。

sentences.english: You should never pay for your children's work.
sentences.chinese: 你从不应该为孩子的劳动而付给他们用度。

sentences.english: Allen would never climb a tall tree.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦从不爬上高的树木。

sentences.english: The road to love is never smooth.
He grew upin Port Arthur, Tex., never knowing his father.
sentences.chinese: 他在亚瑟港长大，从不知道父亲是谁。

sentences.english: "If you never condemned, you would never need to forgive".
sentences.chinese: 如果你从不谴责，你就绝不需要宽恕。

sentences.english: And so I would never write non-fiction if these things didn't occur.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我从不写纪实性文体，如果事情没有发生。

sentences.english: Thank you for never being sarcastic The thing that baffles and bewilders a child.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您从不冷嘲热讽孩子眼中感到迷惑茫然的事情。

sentences.english: But he never curse in his music.
sentences.chinese: 但是在音乐中，张楚从不咒骂。

sentences.english: First, robots never get sick, so absenteeism would be reduced.
sentences.chinese: 首先，机器人从不生病，从而旷工将会减少。

sentences.english: It rankles me that Scott never apologizes when he does something wrong.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特做错事时从不认错道歉，真是令我心痛。

definition: always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
hardly/not in the least/not at all
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
always (previously)/a period of time in the recent past
